H0.text: Which serial killer hanged himself in Wakefield Prison in January 2004, four years after being found guilty of 15 murders. Harold Shipman's Cellmate

H1.text: Which serial killer hanged himself in Wakefield Prison in January 2004, four years after being found guilty of 15 murders. Dennis Nilsen

H2.text: Which serial killer hanged himself in Wakefield Prison in January 2004, four years after being found guilty of 15 murders. Peter Sutcliffe

H3.text: Which serial killer hanged himself in Wakefield Prison in January 2004, four years after being found guilty of 15 murders. Dr Shipman

A4.text: Dennis Andrew Nilsen was imprisoned at HM Prison Full Sutton in the East Riding of Yorkshire.

A5.text: Convicted at the Old Bailey of six counts of murder and two of attempted murder

A6.text: Dennis Nilsen's 2004 appeal to the Royal Courts of Justice, seeking to overturn a 2003 ruling his autobiography cannot be returned to him and must remain unpublished

A7.text: Shipman hanged himself in his cell at Wakefield Prison on 13 January 2004, one day short of his 58th birthday.
